name: El Chapo - Fat 'n Furious!
description:
In "El Chapo - Fat 'n Furious!" you play as El Chapo and ride his motocross to escape a high security prison. Jump, ride, brake - you gotta hurry man, the Mexican feds are after you! But don't forget who you are: the famous El Chapo, a wannabe star. Will you seduce the sizzling women you meet on your journey? Will you raise your own celebrity by agreeing to give superstar Sean Pan your exclusive interview? Or maybe even cut a Hollywood deal? Don't miss the milestones or surrender!
And these damned cops chasing you...how many of them can you stop in their tracks and expose to the world?

FEATURES

★ ride a motocross in a tunnel as far as possible to escape from the jail!
★ jump, dash and avoid all sort of obstacles!
★ unlock 5 achievements to collect 5 funny artworks. How will you feel meeting Sean Pan?
★ super easy controls - can you master the challenge, how far can you go ?
★ pixelart animations
★ super FX & music
★ very addictive game

Like our Facebook page to stay tuned (leaderboard contests, artworks and more surprises to come...)!
